modName: Fight Like A Badass Unarmed Killmoves Unlocked
summary: unarmed killmoves for draugr, wolves, spiders, giants AND DRAGONS
descriptionHtml:
Now you can pummel your way to cool finishers all day against Draugr, Wolves, Spiders, Giants and the ultimate challenge to PUNCH A DRAGON TO DEATH.
Compatible with Killmove mods such as The Dance of Death, just make sure this one is BELOW any of on the load order.
Also check out [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37621/]Skeleton Killmoves Unlocked[/url] so you can smash those skeletons to pieces with your bare hands.

Installation:
Extract into the Skyrim/Data folder and make sure it is checked on the load order; that's it!
Also available on the Steam Workshop [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=155626477]here[/url].

Compatibility:
Incompatible with DUEL - Combat Realism (at this time)

This uses current animations in the game that are used by different weapon types, ones that fit well have been added because no creatures had any unarmed killcams assocated with them.

Credits:
Rusty shield in screenshot from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28146/?]Rusty Iron Shield for draugrs by FuriousFighter[/url].

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3381541/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Check out my other mods![/url]
author: RJinthematrix

files.name: Fight Like a Badass
files.changelogHtml:
removed a couple animations that didn't look right
cleaned up file for better compatibility with Skeleton Killmoves unlocked
